afterSuccessStateExplanation: Your ORBS are now staked and assigned to a Guardian
allowanceSubStep_message_selectAmountOfO: Select the amount of ORBS you want to stake:
allowanceSubStep_stepExplanation: This step will approve the staking contract to transfer your ORBS into the contract in order to be staked (up to the approved amount).
finishedAction_approved: allowed the staking contract to use your tokens
guardianSelectionSubStep_stepExplanation: This step selects which Guardian you would like to delegate to, adding your staked ORBS to their influence.
guardianSelectionSubStep_subMessage_must: You must unregister before delegating to another Guardian
stakingSubStep_stepExplanation: This step will transfer your ORBS to the staking contract and stake them. Staking makes the Orbs Network more secure and incentivizes the Delegators, Guardians, and Validators to participate.
stakingSubStep_stepTitle: In this step you will stake {{orbsForStaking}} ORBS
